participant_1.background:
I make friends fast and say goodbye fast.
I kayak at the lake on weekends.
I am studying to be a special education teacher.
I was a navy brat and have attended 16 schools in 12 years.
I chew my nails.

participant_2.background:
I love to go hiking.
I am a bank teller.
I have never been out of the country.
I have never been to college.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go hiking.
That's great! I love hiking too. I've been to a lot of different places and seen some amazing things.
Where have you been?
I've been to the mountains, the beach, and the desert. I've also been to some different countries.
That's really cool! I've never been out of the country.
You should definitely go sometime! It's a great experience.
I know! I'm planning on going to Europe next year.
That's awesome! I've been to Europe a few times and I love it there.
What's your favorite place you've ever been?
I'm not sure I could pick just one. I love the mountains in Colorado, the beaches in California, and the cities in Europe.
Those all sound amazing! I can't wait to experience them for myself.
I'm sure you'll love them.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go kayaking, biking, and camping. I also like to read and play video games.
That's cool! I like to do some of those things too. I love to go camping and kayaking.
Yeah, they're both really fun. I've never been biking or camping before.
You should definitely try them sometime! They're both really fun and you can get some exercise.
I will! I'm always looking for new things to try.
Good! I'm sure you'll love them.
Thanks! I'm sure I will.
